buyerGroup.headline: Affiliate Manager en The Best Match Group
buyerGroup.personalizedMessage: Hi Madeleine Tbm, I noticed your role as Affiliate Manager at Match Group. Given your expertise in Sales, you'd be interested in our AI Impact Visibility Platform that helps companies measure the ROI of their AI initiatives. 95% of generative AI pilots fail - we help prove AI ROI.
buyerGroup.valueProposition: Close the AI Impact Gap - Measure business ROI of AI initiatives
buyerGroup.productFit: Perfect for Sales teams looking to quantify AI success
buyerGroup.winningVariantContext: Match Group's AI-powered recommendation systems and user matching algorithms would benefit from ROI measurement
